description:
Smoker attacks Vergo for assaulting his men, Luffy meets something strange in the trash heap, and a flashback reveals the true depths of Caesar`s madness!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Butsukaru Kobushi! Futari no Chuujou no Tatakai
Fists Collide! A Battle of the Two Vice Admirals!
Quand les poings s’entrechoquent. Duel entre Vice-amiraux !
Scontro nel G-5! Smoker contro Vergo
صِدام قبضات! معركة بين نائبَيْ أميرال
ぶつかる拳! 二人の中将の戦い
